961710.name: Puzzle Out VR
961710.description:
Experience the only puzzle game in VR that features tangram puzzles in a space capsule!

Features

  • Move around an atmospheric setting
  • 10 interesting levels
  • Increasing difficulty to test your dexterity and visual thinking
  • Destroyable crystals to suspend the wall's movement
  • See the surroundings and distant earth through your space helmet with visor UI
  • Autosave
  • Atmospheric music and sound effects

Story

It's the age of commercial and cheap space travel which allows everyone to travel between planets in the solar system. You are on your journey back home to earth from an expedition to mars to find rare crystals. As you approach the earth, a strange alien wall appears to hinder you from examine the crystals.
